_description: James Ryman, a song of the Nativity — eight stanzas (aaab), each ending with a short Latin line that rhymes with burden (b): Letabundus exultet fidelis chorus alleluia

CULEe112.First Lines:
The incorrupt wombe virginallHath borne the king of kingis
                    alle…
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 276-7.
